languages.text: {n}Abelard's brow rises sharply.{/n} "I am exceedingly curious, Lord Captain. Please, do tell."

languages.text: {n}Abelard zieht eine Augenbraue hoch.{/n} "Ich bin überaus gespannt, Lord Captain. Bitte erzählt es mir."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's brow rises sharply.{/n} "I am exceedingly curious, Lord Captain. Please, do tell."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard zieht eine Augenbraue hoch.{/n} "Ich bin überaus gespannt, Lord Captain. Bitte erzählt es mir."

languages.text: {n}Abélard hausse brusquement un sourcil.{/n} « Je suis particulièrement curieux de nature, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Allez-y, je suis tout ouïe. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's brow rises sharply.{/n} "I am exceedingly curious, Lord Captain. Please, do tell."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard hausse brusquement un sourcil.{/n} « Je suis particulièrement curieux de nature, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Allez-y, je suis tout ouïe. »

languages.text: {n}Abelard arquea repentinamente las cejas.{/n} «Siento una inmensa curiosidad, Lord Capitán. Por favor, soy todo oídos».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's brow rises sharply.{/n} "I am exceedingly curious, Lord Captain. Please, do tell."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard arquea repentinamente las cejas.{/n} «Siento una inmensa curiosidad, Lord Capitán. Por favor, soy todo oídos».

languages.text: {n}アベラルドの眉がキッと吊り上がる。{/n}「非常に興味がありますね、ロード・キャプテン。どうぞ教えてください」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's brow rises sharply.{/n} "I am exceedingly curious, Lord Captain. Please, do tell."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドの眉がキッと吊り上がる。{/n}「非常に興味がありますね、ロード・キャプテン。どうぞ教えてください」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德猛地扬起了一条眉毛。{/n}“我非常好奇，舰长大人。请您务必和我讲讲。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's brow rises sharply.{/n} "I am exceedingly curious, Lord Captain. Please, do tell."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德猛地扬起了一条眉毛。{/n}“我非常好奇，舰长大人。请您务必和我讲讲。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard'ın kaşları hızla kalkıyor.{/n} "Merakım her geçen saniye artıyor Lord Kaptan. Anlatın lütfen."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's brow rises sharply.{/n} "I am exceedingly curious, Lord Captain. Please, do tell."
